treatments.title: Deep Pore Cleansing
treatments.description: A deep-cleansing facial designed to detoxify and decongest clogged pores. Includes thorough extractions and a purifying treatment mask.

treatments.title: Acne Treatment
treatments.description: Tailored for acne-prone skin, this treatment calms inflammation, reduces breakouts, and helps prevent future acne flare-ups.

treatments.title: Basic Hydrating Treatment
treatments.description: Infuses the skin with moisture, improving elasticity and radiance. Suitable for dry, normal, and combination skin types.

treatments.title: Advanced Hydrating Treatment
treatments.description: Delivers intensive hydration and deep nourishment, ideal for dry or unbalanced skin. Suitable for dry, normal, and combination skin types.

treatments.title: Combo Treatment
treatments.description: A comprehensive treatment that combines deep cleansing and intensive hydration, customized to meet your unique skin needs.

treatments.title: Anti-Aging Treat
treatments.description: A rejuvenating facial that enhances skin elasticity, smooths fine lines, brightens dull complexion, and slows visible signs of aging.

treatments.title: Basic Eye Treatment
treatments.description: Reduces puffiness and brightens the under-eye area for a refreshed, youthful appearance.

treatments.title: Advanced Eye Treat
treatments.description: Targets fine lines, dark circles, and puffiness using advanced formulas for visible lifting and firming around the eyes.

treatments.title: Basic Neck Treat
treatments.description: Hydrates and smooths the neck area to improve skin texture and tone.

treatments.title: Advanced Neck Treat
treatments.description: Delivers intensive firming and lifting to reduce crepiness and improve neck contour.
